post.title: Tools to Protect Your Privacy Online
post.body:
[Tor Browser](https://www.torproject.org/projects/torbrowser.html.en): web browser
[I2P](https://geti2p.net/en/)

[Telegram](https://telegram.org): messaging app
[Bitmessage](https://bitmessage.org)

[DuckDuckGo](https://duckduckgo.com/): search engine [3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion](https://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion/)

[KProxy](https://kproxy.com/): web proxy

[MEGA](https://mega.nz/): cloud storage
[IPFS](https://ipfs.io)

[Offcloud](https://offcloud.com/?=bd34fd19): cloud downloading

post.title: Decentralized and Uncensorable Free Online Marketplaces
post.body:
[OpenBazaar](https://www.openbazaar.org/) Buy and Sell Freely!

[LBRY](https://lbry.io) Digital Content Freedom!

post.title: Where to find magnet links and torrent files?
ZeroBlog Tips
post.body:
1.  Formatting: click the "?" for formatting guide when editing blog post body.

2.  Uploading/Post image (easy!): [http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:101:Image+uploading+and+zooming](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:101:Image+uploading+and+zooming)

3.  Increase peers (add more seeds for your blog): Just visit your site using ZeroNet proxies. If you see "Content publish failed" error when publishing a new site, it usually means there is no peer seeding your site, and you can try to visit your site using proxies or another computer while you're publishing. You can also submit your site address to the following lists: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n

post.title: How to create your first ZeroNet Blog
post.body:
First create a zeronet site manually (suggested): [https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using_zeronet/create_new_site/](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/using_zeronet/create_new_site/)
Note: In windows, cmd goto ZeroNet-win-dist\lib, change command "zeronet.py" to "zeronet".
Video tutorial: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-x9Ob7kktE](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-x9Ob7kktE)
Save your private key and site address!

Then follow the official instructions here:
[http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8/?Post:3:How+to+have+a+blog+like+this](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8/?Post:3:How+to+have+a+blog+like+this)

Note: Delete the line ""domain": "Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit"," in "content.json", or change the domain name to your own [.bit domain registered using Namecoin](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq/#how-can-i-register-a-bit-domain).

post.title: Congratulations!
post.body: Your zeronet blog has been successfully created!
